comments.content:
Tekton Bold with an upside down D?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tekton/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tekton/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tekton/")
Was I right? In only 2 minutes. Is that a record? Do I get a prize?
_Very similar_ to Tekton, prolly a freeware/shareware rip-off.
No prizes for _’very similar’_ around here though, eh?
